description: Schema for data extracted from a SmarTone monthly statement (Final Unified Schema). This schema forces a single, standardized structure, including nested keys, to ensure consistent CSV output.

provider.description: Name of the telecom provider. MUST be 'SmarTone'.

__filename.description: The filename of the source PDF document.

customer_name.description: The standardized key for the account holder's name.

account_number.description: The standardized key for the unique 8-digit account number. Corresponds to '賬戶號碼'.

invoice_number.description: The standardized key for the invoice number. SmarTone bills do not have this, so the value should be null.

invoice_date.description: The standardized key for the bill issue date, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Corresponds to '發單日期'.

payment_due_date.description: The standardized key for the autopay date, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

billing_summary.description: A standardized object for the summary of charges, payments, and balances.

previous_bill_amount.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to '前單總額'.

payment_received.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to the '自動轉賬' amount marked 'CR'. MUST be negative.

balance_forwarded.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to '戶口結餘'.

current_charges.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to '本月收費總額'.

total_amount_due.description: Standardized key. Corresponds to '本月收費總額'.

service_details.description: A standardized array containing the detailed billing breakdown for each phone number on the account.

service_number.description: Standardized key. The 8-digit phone number. Corresponds to '流動電話/服務 號碼'.

user_name.description: The standardized key for the user's name. Not applicable for SmarTone, so the value should be null.

subtotal.description: The subtotal for the service number. Corresponds to '項目總額'.

charge_items.description: A standardized array of individual charge or credit items for this phone number.

description.description: Standardized key. The Chinese description of the charge or credit item from '項目內容'.

period.description: Standardized key. The date or date range for the service from '日期'. Can be null.

amount.description: Standardized key. The amount of the charge. MUST be negative for items marked 'CR'.
